metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5262 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in the graph settings script (graph_settings.php) in Cacti 0.8.8b and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5262` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-5ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-5ubuntu0.1').
